Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Emergency lighting system failure. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component.
Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
